name: users
description: Maintains the user database based on data from other topics and requests made directly to it

/register.description: Complete the registration of an account

parameters.userName: The userName that the user wants to be associated with - unique across all users
parameters.email: The users email to be validated
parameters.cellCountry: The country code of the cell phone in ISO 3166 ALPHA-3
parameters.cell: The mobile phone of the user to be validated
parameters.smsResults: If the user wants results via SMS or not
parameters.emailNewsletter: If the user wants newsletters via email or not
parameters.limitDepositWeekly: The max deposit amount per week expressed as a whole integer in currencyCode
parameters.validateUsingCell: True, we send a flash SMS. False, we send an email.

/checkUserName.description: Check if a username is available or not in the registration form

parameters.userName: The userName that the user wants to be associated with - unique across all users
